insert into t_parklot_mortgage (mortgageId, parklotNum, parkCetificateNum, mortgageMan, mortgageTel, mortgageStatus, mortgageCycle, mortgageRate, overdueStatus, overdueTimes, carparkId) values (#{mortgageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkcetificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgagetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mortgagecycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mortgagerate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{overduestatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{overduetimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update t_parklot_mortgage set parklotNum = #{parklotnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parkCetificateNum = #{parkcetificatenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mortgageMan = #{mortgageman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mortgageTel = #{mortgagetel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mortgageStatus = #{mortgagestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mortgageCycle = #{mortgagecycle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mortgageRate = #{mortgagerate,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, overdueStatus = #{overduestatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, overdueTimes = #{overduetimes,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carparkId = #{carparkid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where mortgageId = #{mortgageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select mortgageId, parklotNum, parkCetificateNum, mortgageMan, mortgageTel, mortgageStatus, mortgageCycle, mortgageRate, overdueStatus, overdueTimes, carparkId from t_parklot_mortgage where mortgageId = #{mortgageid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
